Module mp.ims.mpgroup4

Package mp.ims.mpgroup4.controllers

package mp.ims.mpgroup4.controllers
Package containing all relevant controllers for Inventory Management. This package contains classes pertaining to relevant features for the system. Primarily the controller classes for each function available to the user (i.e. ,).
Author:
Arianne Acosta, Joy Arellano, Clark Rodriguez
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddScreenController
    Controller class for the AddScreen.fxml file, responsible for handling user interactions and managing data for adding or modifying items.
    ExportScreenController
    Controller class for handling export functionality in the application.
    ImportScreenController
    Controller class for the ImportScreen.fxml file, responsible for handling user interactions related to importing data from CSV files.
    ItemController
    The `ItemController` class is responsible for managing and controlling the interaction between the graphical user interface (GUI) and the underlying data model for items.
    ItemUsageScreenController
    Controller class for the ItemUsageScreen popup Contains methods for detailing item usage in the inventory screen.
    RestockScreenController
     
    UpdateScreenController
